title: Handle ungraceful JsonRpc disconnetion from remote
body:
Need to handle the following reported by Kamil:
```

2023-05-02 20:39:10.9296|SNAP - (NextSlotRange:1200, diff:10) 8 - Requests Account:3 | Storage:71 | Code:1 | Refresh:0 - Queues Slots:0 | Storages:1172 | Codes:35330 | Refresh:0

2023-05-02 20:39:12.2841|Error during parsing/validation. Microsoft.AspNetCore.Connections.ConnectionResetException: An existing connection was forcibly closed by the remote host.
 ---> System.Net.Sockets.SocketException (10054): An existing connection was forcibly closed by the remote host.
```

We have much more than this - for example when CL starts to spam with eth_getBlockByNumber and we stop a node in the middle of the batch we have plenty of errors.
